batterytype: 4 x AA batteries (Alkaline, Lithium, Nickel and Rechargeable Ni-MH)
flashmodes: Flash-on and Flash-off modes., Low-speed synchro, Low-speed synchro + Red-eye
autofocus: Yes, Contrast Detect, Multi-Area, Tracking, Single, Face Detection, Live View
whitebalancing: White Balance Presets (8), Custom White Balance, Auto, Daylight, Shade, Tungsten light, Fluorescent light (D,N, W), Manual setting
otherfocusfeatures: Normal Focus Range (40 cm), Macro Focus Range (1 cm), No. Of Focus Points (9), Focal Length Multiplier (5.5x)
facedetection: Yes, Face Detection AF&AE is available at all mode. 32 people at most. Smile Capture. Blinking Detection. Pet detection: Detect up to 1 pet's face(auto or select from pre-registered three faces)
operatingsystem: Microsoft Windows XP SP3, Vista and 7, Mac OS X 10.3.9 or above
shootingmodes: Auto Picture, USER, Movie, Handheld Night Snap, Sport, Landscape, Portrait, SCN (Flower, Blue Sky, Sunset, Night Scene, Night Scene Portrait, Fireworks, HDR, Surf & Snow, Baby, Kids, Pet, Food, Digital SR, Stage Lighting, Text, Museum, Digital Wide, Digital Panorama, Frame Composite), Green
